about_the_game:
MedCom Origin is a story about a city where there was an outbreak of an unknown virus with a high mortality rate.

Once prosperous, being a showcase of the country's achievements, now this place has turned into an abscess on the body of the state. PMCs shoot people right on the streets of the city, parks and squares turn into warehouses for corpses.

The city is in a panic, and only the armed forces and elite employees of MedCom Corporation can change the course of events.

Travel to the foggy streets of the city, shrouded in chaos and fear, where every step implies survival. Immerse yourself in the emotional intensity of events, explore mysterious corners to find answers and return the city to normal life.

Join teams of other players to fight together with other players and bots, liberate territories and identify the sources of the virus.

Maximize your effectiveness in combat by using various weapon modifications. Customize your strategies and approaches to the battles to counter the threat and win the fight for survival.

Get ready for an exciting mix of action and fight for survival. Will you be able to resist the virus and return the city to normal life?

Welcome to the city, welcome to hell.

Features:

- Session PVE FPS Shooter

- Play as feds or as PMCs fighters

- Team gameplay

- A narrative telling about a city that has become a death trap.
